author Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com> 1509269433 -0400
committer Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com> 1509335185 -0700

Bump to 0.0.167 (rustup to rustc 1.23.0-nightly (90ef3372e 2017-10-29))

files.patch:
@@ -1,6 +1,10 @@
 # Change Log
 All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
+## 0.0.167
+* Rustup to *rustc 1.23.0-nightly (90ef3372e 2017-10-29)*
+* New lints: [`const_static_lifetime`], [`erasing_op`], [`fallible_impl_from`], [`println_empty_string`], [`useless_asref`]
+
 ## 0.0.166
 * Rustup to *rustc 1.22.0-nightly (b7960878b 2017-10-18)*
 * New lints: [`explicit_write`], [`identity_conversion`], [`implicit_hasher`], [`invalid_ref`], [`option_map_or_none`], [`range_minus_one`], [`range_plus_one`], [`transmute_int_to_bool`], [`transmute_int_to_char`], [`transmute_int_to_float`]
